data.caption: Communication To Shareholders-Intimation Of Tax Deduction On Interim Dividend
data.news_body: Pursuant to the declaration of Interim Dividend by the Board of Directors of the Company at its Board Meeting held on January 23 2026 the Company has sent the enclosed email communication to its shareholders whose email addresses are registered with the Company/ Depository Participants. The specimen of the communication is appended for your information and record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 47 of the SEBI Listing Regulation we are enclosing herewith the copy of the Newspaper "Business Standard" (English - National Daily Mumbai Edition)" and "Mumbai Lakshdeep" (Mumbai Edition) of today i.e. Saturday January 24 2026 wherein the Un-audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025 have been published.

data.caption: Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (LODR) 2015 The Board Of Directors Have Approved To Sell A Immovable Property.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) 2015 the Board of Directors have approved to sell a immovable property.

data.caption: Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) 2015 The Board Of Directors Have Approved Purchase Of Land.
data.news_body: Pursuant to the provisions of the SEBI (LODR) 2015 the Board of Directors have approved to purchase of a land.

data.caption: Fixation Of Record Date For Interim Dividend For F.Y. 2025-26 On January 30 2026.
data.news_body: Record date is January 30 2026 for determining entitlement of the members to the interim dividend for F.Y. 2025-26.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
data.news_body: The Board Of Directors declared an Interim Dividend of Rs. 0.75 per equity share of the Company (i.e. 37.5% of the FV of Rs.2/- each of equity share) for Financial year 2025-26. Further record date is January 30 2026 for determining the entitlement of members  to an interim dividend for F.Y. 2025-26

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. Friday January 23 2026
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI(LODR) 2015 we hereby inform that BOD at its meeting held today i.e. Friday 23 January 2026 has considered and approved the following: 
1. Un-audited Stand and Consol financial results of the company for Quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025.
2. Interim Dividend for F.Y.2025-26
3. Purchase of land parcel
4. Sale of immovable property

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. Friday January 23 2026
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI(LODR) 2015 we hereby inform that BOD at its meeting held today i.e. Friday 23 January 2026 has considered and approved the following: 
1. Un-audited Stand and Consol financial results of the company for Quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025.
2. Interim Dividend for F.Y.2025-26
3. Purchase of land parcel
4. Sale of immovable property

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. Friday January 23 2026
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that the BOB at its meeting held today i.e. Friday January 23 2026 has considered and approved the following: -1. Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and nine months ended December 31 20252. The Board of Directors of the Company declared an Interim Dividend of Rs. 0.75 per Equity Share of the Company (i.e. 37.5% of the face value of Rs. 2/- each of equity share) for the financial year 2025-26. Further record date is January 30 2026 for determining entitlement of the members to an interim dividend for the Financial Year 2025-26.3. Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations the Board of Directors have approved to purchase a land parcel admeasuring 453.55 decimals. 4. Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations the Board of Directors have approved to sell its immovable property

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that the company has scheduled an Earnings call with the Analyst/Investors on Wednesday January 28 2026 at 11.00 a.m. (IST) to discuss Un-Audited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) for quarter and nine-months ended December 31 2025 (Q3 & 9M FY2026).

data.caption: Intimation For Change In Email Address Of MUFG Intime India Private Limited Registrar And Share Transfer Agent (RTA) Of The Company.
data.news_body: We would like to inform you that the email address of our RTA has changed from mumbai@in.mpms.mufg.com to investor.helpdesk@in.mpms.mufg.com.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 29 of SEBI (LODR) regulations 2015. This is to inform you that the meeting of the Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday 232026 to consider and approve the Un-audited Financial results (Standalone and consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended December 31 2025 Declaration of Interim Dividend on the equity shares if any for financial year 2025-26 Fixation of record date if dividend is declared by the Board of Directors of the company.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting Under Regulation 29(1) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of
India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (The Listing Regulations)
As Amended (The Listing Regulation
data.news_body:
Gandhar Oil Refinery (India) Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 23/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the Listing Regulations this is to inform you that Meeting of the Board of Directors
of  (the Company) is scheduled to be held on Friday January 23 2026 to
consider and approve the following:
1. Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended
December 31 2025.
2. Declaration of Interim Dividend on equity shares if any for the Financial year 2025-26; and
3. Fixation of Record Date if Dividend is declared by the Board of Directors of the Company.
We further wish to inform you that in terms of the provision of SEBI (PIT) Regulations 2015 as amended and the Companys Code of Fair Disclosure and Code of Conduct for Prevention
of Insider Trading the Trading window for dealing in securities of the Company which was closed from January
01 2026 shall continue to be closed for all Connected/ Designated Persons and their immediate relatives till 48
hours after the announcement of outcome of the Board Meeting.

data.caption: Approval For Voluntary Liquidation Of Gandhar Shipping And Logistics Private Limited Wholly- Owned Subsidiary Of The Company.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of SEBI (LODR) regulations 2015. This is with reference to the above mentioned subject the Board of Directors of Gandhar Shipping and logistics private limited  WOS at its meeting resolved to pursue the process of its voluntary liquidation.
In consideration of the above the Board of directors of the company at its meeting held today passed the resolution and accorded its approval for the voluntary liquidation of Gandhar shipping and logistics private limited under applicable provisions of insolvency and bankruptcy code 2016.
Further Gandhar Shipping and logistics private limited is not a material subsidiary of the company and the liquidation will not affect any business and will not have any material impact on the consolidated financials of the Company. Details as attached in the letter.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Scheme of Arrangement
data.news_body:
This is in furtherance to our intimation dated February 04 2025 wherein the board had approved the scheme of amalgamation of WOS Gandhar Shipping and Logistics private limited and Gandhar Oil refinery (India) Limited and their respective shareholders (the scheme) under section 230 to 232 of the Companies Act 2013 read with relevant rules and regulations.

In view of the current business and operational considerations the management has now approved to discontinue the aforesaid scheme of amalgamation.

data.caption: Un-Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter Ended September 30 2025
data.news_body: Un-audited Standalone and consolidated Financial results for the quarter ended September 30 2025.

data.caption: Un-Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter Ended September 30 2025
data.news_body: Un-audited Standalone and consolidated Financial results for the quarter ended September 30 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. Wednesday November 12 2025
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. Wednesday November 12 2025 has inter-alia considered and approved the following:
1. Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025 including disclosures required under Regulations 33 and other provisions of the Listing Regulations as applicable together with the Limited Review Report issued by M/s. K J K & Associates Chartered Accountants (FRN:  112159W) Mumbai the Statutory Auditors of the Company.
2. Discontinuation of the Scheme of Amalgamation of WOS Company viz. Gandhar Shipping & Logistics Private Limited  with Gandhar Oil Refinery (India) Limited and their respective Shareholders (the Scheme).
3. Approval for voluntary liquidation of Gandhar Shipping and Logistics Private Limited WOS of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: With reference to our earlier letter dated November 10th 2025 we would like to inform you that due to unavoidable reasons the post conference call with Analysts & Investors on Q2 & H1 of the Company has been rescheduled to Friday November 14 2025 at 10:30 a.m. IST.  All other details pertaining to the call shall remain unchanged.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting Under Regulation 29(1) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (The Listing Regulations) As Amended (The Listing Regulations)
data.news_body: Gandhar Oil Refinery (India) Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 12/11/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the Listing regulations this is to inform you that meeting of the Board of directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Wednesday November 12 2025 to consider and approve Un-audited Financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended September 30 2025 and any other business as may be decided by the Board during the meeting.

data.caption: Intimation For Termination Of Joint Venture Agreement
data.news_body: In continuation to our intimation dated Tuesday September 23 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (LODR) 2015. we wish to inform you that the Joint venture (JV) Company namely Texol Oils FZC has been liquidated and simultaneously the termination agreement has been executed on October 17 2025 for the closure of the said JV Company.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations 2018 we are enclosing herewith a copy of certificate received from MUFG Intime India Private Limited Registrar & Transfer Agent of the Company for the Quarter ended September 30 2025.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: This is to inform you that pursuant to the "Code of Fair disclosure and code of conduct for prevention of Insider Trading of Company and SEBI (prohibition of insider trading) Regulations 2015 as amended from time to time the trading window for dealing in securities will remain closed for all Designated persons/connected and their immediate relatives from Wednesday October 01 2025 till 48 hours after the declaration of the Unaudited financial results by the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.

data.caption: Intimation About The Approval For Termination Of Agreement And Closure Of The JV Company Namely Texol Oils FZC.
data.news_body: The Company as corporate shareholder holds 50% shares of Texol Oils FZC (JV) which had received commercial license from hamriyah free zone Authority Sharjah under no.(24670) now intend(s) (subject to the approval from the registrar) to terminate all existing license of the company and to terminate the Joint venture agreement entered with the Joint venture partner namely ESPE Oils FZC and to close/wind-up the Joint venture Company namely Texol Oils FZC.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E.Tuesday September 23 2025
data.news_body:
The Company as corporate Shareholder holds 50% shares of TEXOL OILS FZC (Joint
Venture Company) which had received Commercial License from Hamriyah Free Zone
Authority Sharjah under No. (24670) now intend(s) (subject to the approval from the
Registrar) to terminate all existing License(s) of the Company and to terminate the
Joint Venture Agreement entered with the Joint Venture partner namely ESPE Oils
FZC and to close/wind-up the Joint Venture company namely Texol Oils FZC.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to the letter dated 16th July 2025 issued by Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) Investor Education and Protection Fund Authority the Company has initiated the "100 Days Campaign- Saksham Niveshak" with the objective of reaching out to shareholders whose dividends remain unclaimed/unpaid. In this regard the Company has published notices on September 152025 in "Business Standard" English newspaper and "Parshuram Samachar" regional (Marathi) newspaper.

data.caption: Intimation For Non-Applicability Of Re-Lodgement Of Transfer Requests Of Physical Shares.
data.news_body: Since the Company got listed in November 2023 and all the shares of the Company are in 100% Demat mode and there are no physical shares the SEBI Circular dated July 02 2025 for Re-Lodgement of Transfer of physical shares is not applicable.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) 2015 read with Part A of Schedule III The Company has received a Rate Contract/Framework Agreement from Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL) Jhansi for a period of two years for supply of transformer Oil.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
